answers.answer: ME!! I'm on the wait!! We are actually on the same CD...I am on CD21 too. I have no idea when I ovulated and this cycle is making me angry!! LOL I usually feel sore bbs after O but I have nothing. I have been getting twinges and crampy episodes here and there but that's been happening this whole cycle...since CD7!!I woke up yesterday morning with a sore throat and have been nauseous the last 2 days but I think it's from being sick! I hate taking things for it just because of the possibility.

I'm on my last week  i'm on CD23, 9DPO AF is due friday, i had no cramping during ovulation this month but had it after ovulation, my boobs were mega sore last week but have calmed down slightly over the past few days, i was bloated for a while also last week but again it's disappearing gradually.  I don't think i'm gonnae get my BFP even though my partner and i covered every last aspect this month.  I think i'm just used to BFN's after 29 months of ttc and never having a positive result.  I wish you all the best of luck and hopefully one of us will see that BFP before xmas!!!

question: well, im on cd21, and i know shes on her way! got sore bbs, a bit tender than normal and had slightly swollen tummy but again putting them both down to AF, been having some really dizzy spells lately though and my dad is diabetic so when AF arrives and i can rule out pregnancy i think i might go and get tested for diabetes. :S  One thing that is making me rule out pregnancy this month is that ive had no cramping or any twinges so doesnt look too promising :(  anybody else on the last week wait?
title: cd21! waiting for AF
